publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-744 Mr Kenny MacAskill: Craigmillar Independent Inquiry—That the Parliament notes with concern that, notwithstanding the PIEDA report, there is further suggestion of irregularities and financial maladministration in the Craigmillar area, and accordingly believes that a full and independent investigation should be undertaken into the organisation and workings of Craigmillar Opportunities Trust, Craigmillar Festival Society, Craigmillar Partnership and subsidiary projects in the Craigmillar area.
S1M-744 Craigmillar Independent Inquiry (lodged on 5 April 2000) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Michael Russell*
S1M-744# Craigmillar Independent Inquiry (lodged on 5 April 2000) Fergus Ewing*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Tricia Marwick*
S1M-744# Craigmillar Independent Inquiry (lodged on 5 April 2000) Alex Neil*

S1M-744# Mr Kenny MacAskill: Craigmillar Independent Inquiry—That the Parliament notes with concern that, notwithstanding the PIEDA report, there is further suggestion of irregularities and financial maladministration in the Craigmillar area, and accordingly believes that a full and independent investigation should be undertaken into the organisation and workings of Craigmillar Opportunities Trust, Craigmillar Festival Society, Craigmillar Partnership and subsidiary projects in the Craigmillar area. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Michael Russell, Fergus Ewing, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Tricia Marwick, Alex Neil
S1M-744# Craigmillar Independent Inquiry (lodged on 5 April 2000) Mr Adam Ingram*, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-744# Craigmillar Independent Inquiry (lodged on 5 April 2000) Mr Gil Paterson*, Andrew Wilson*
S1M-744# Craigmillar Independent Inquiry (lodged on 5 April 2000) Kay Ullrich*

S1M-744# Mr Kenny MacAskill: Craigmillar Independent Inquiry—That the Parliament notes with concern that, notwithstanding the PIEDA report, there is further suggestion of irregularities and financial maladministration in the Craigmillar area, and accordingly believes that a full and independent investigation should be undertaken into the organisation and workings of Craigmillar Opportunities Trust, Craigmillar Festival Society, Craigmillar Partnership and subsidiary projects in the Craigmillar area. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Michael Russell, Fergus Ewing, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Tricia Marwick, Alex Neil, Mr Adam Ingram, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Gil Paterson, Andrew Wilson, Kay Ullrich

S1M-744# Mr Kenny MacAskill: Craigmillar Independent Inquiry—That the Parliament notes with concern that, notwithstanding the PIEDA report, there is further suggestion of irregularities and financial maladministration in the Craigmillar area, and accordingly believes that a full and independent investigation should be undertaken into the organisation and workings of Craigmillar Opportunities Trust, Craigmillar Festival Society, Craigmillar Partnership and subsidiary projects in the Craigmillar area. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Michael Russell, Fergus Ewing, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Tricia Marwick, Alex Neil, Mr Adam Ingram, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Gil Paterson, Andrew Wilson, Kay Ullrich, Mr Jamie Stone*

S1M-744# Mr Kenny MacAskill: Craigmillar Independent Inquiry-That the Parliament notes with concern that, notwithstanding the PIEDA report, there is further suggestion of irregularities and financial maladministration in the Craigmillar area, and accordingly believes that a full and independent investigation should be undertaken into the organisation and workings of Craigmillar Opportunities Trust, Craigmillar Festival Society, Craigmillar Partnership and subsidiary projects in the Craigmillar area. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Michael Russell, Fergus Ewing, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Tricia Marwick, Alex Neil, Mr Adam Ingram, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Gil Paterson, Andrew Wilson, Kay Ullrich, Mr Jamie Stone

S1M-744# Mr Kenny MacAskill: Craigmillar Independent Inquiry—That the Parliament notes with concern that, notwithstanding the PIEDA report, there is further suggestion of irregularities and financial maladministration in the Craigmillar area, and accordingly believes that a full and independent investigation should be undertaken into the organisation and workings of Craigmillar Opportunities Trust, Craigmillar Festival Society, Craigmillar Partnership and subsidiary projects in the Craigmillar area. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Michael Russell, Fergus Ewing, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Tricia Marwick, Alex Neil, Mr Adam Ingram, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Gil Paterson, Andrew Wilson, Kay Ullrich, Mr Jamie Stone
S1M-744# Craigmillar Independent Inquiry (lodged on 5 April 2000) Fiona McLeod*

S1M-744# Mr Kenny MacAskill: Craigmillar Independent Inquiry—That the Parliament notes with concern that, notwithstanding the PIEDA report, there is further suggestion of irregularities and financial maladministration in the Craigmillar area, and accordingly believes that a full and independent investigation should be undertaken into the organisation and workings of Craigmillar Opportunities Trust, Craigmillar Festival Society, Craigmillar Partnership and subsidiary projects in the Craigmillar area. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Michael Russell, Fergus Ewing, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Tricia Marwick, Alex Neil, Mr Adam Ingram, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Gil Paterson, Andrew Wilson, Kay Ullrich, Mr Jamie Stone, Fiona McLeod

S1M-744# Mr Kenny MacAskill: Craigmillar Independent Inquiry-That the Parliament notes with concern that, notwithstanding the PIEDA report, there is further suggestion of irregularities and financial maladministration in the Craigmillar area, and accordingly believes that a full and independent investigation should be undertaken into the organisation and workings of Craigmillar Opportunities Trust, Craigmillar Festival Society, Craigmillar Partnership and subsidiary projects in the Craigmillar area. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Michael Russell, Fergus Ewing, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Tricia Marwick, Alex Neil, Mr Adam Ingram, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Gil Paterson, Andrew Wilson, Kay Ullrich, Mr Jamie Stone, Fiona McLeod
